useCase.name: Create Collection
useCase.description: Library staff creates a new collection with custom metadata fields.

preconditions.precondition: Library staff has access to the collection creation form.

successEndConditions.condition: Collection is successfully saved in the database.

useCase.trigger: User wants to create a new collection with custom metadata fields.

mainSequence.step: Library Staff accesses the collection creation form.
Library Staff fills and submits the form with custom metadata fields.
Server Application validates and saves the collection data.
Server Application displays success message to Library Staff.
